question:
Which of the following statements are correct regrading Nur Jahan?
1. Nur Jahan encouraged Persian art and culture in the court.
2. She was conferred the status of Padshah Begum and was the only woman in Mughal Darbar.
3. Coins were also struck in her name and all royal farmans had her name along with Jahangir.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Nur Jahan encouraged Persian art and culture in the court. She was conferred the status of Padshah Begum and was the only woman in Mughal Darbar. Coins were also struck in her name and all royal farmans had her name along with Jahangir.
